entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or rain beginning in the morning then changing to rain near noon and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
